name: SCIENTIFIC GAMES INTERNATIONAL, INC., Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Department of Revenue, Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Department of General Services, and Gtech Corporation, Appellees
name_abbreviation: Scientific Games International, Inc. v. Commonwealth

parties: SCIENTIFIC GAMES INTERNATIONAL, INC., Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Department of Revenue, Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Department of General Services, and Gtech Corporation, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 17th day of July, 2012, the order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

48 A.3d 1230
SCIENTIFIC GAMES INTERNATIONAL, INC., Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Department of Revenue, Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Department of General Services, and Gtech Corporation, Appellees.
